reviewText: As a John Gilbert fan this movie was a must for me, since it was his last. This is a funny little film and worth a watch ;)
I saw this film on TCM and really liked it.  I liked it so much, in fact, that I ordered the book.

Reflects the novel well and is John Gilbert's final film. He is fine and has no vocal problems but it does seem as if they are not only playing drunks but living that way. Entertaining especially so for those who have read the source material.
Excellent Movie!! For as popular as the stooges are world wide you would think that these companys like TCM would put them all on DVD.They sure have the bank roll to due so.
